ossible than to stand only on that which is empirically proveable. The very=

ip. What that research has demonstrated is that there are

t we know this anomalous ability exists. What we do not

ence, is whether discarnate entities are communicating.

rch mediums involved believe so, such is the nature of

eriences. But the Science cannot, to date, support

hat is critical to understand here.

At the same time, it is important to r=
ecognize that using technology does

thod nor does is mean one is doing 
Science. What it does mean is that a pa=
rt of the experience is documented
and that might be useful at some future =

e the documents. Today this is,

nown is that people are recording audio and video and believe

ptured anomalies. Many people think these represent voices

oved ones. Unfortuantely the pure truth is that Science is

 position to validate this at this time. But that does not

uld stop, nor that anyone should feel they have no reason

ht be going on, or to speculate about the phenomena.

nics and skeptics who demand proof are going to
have a hard time finding it=
. If Science is not yet able to describe what it

ics and cynics have no way to determine what

owever choose to accept some personal

able proof should they so desire.

ed by Science.

Dr. Donald Hoffman is an expert on visual perception and is=
 one of

y

entist who completely understands how people misperceive things,

s controversial theories challenge even some of the world's

tical physicists when it comes to understanding. Clearly

ts who appreciate this phenomena may well be real.

with them frequently. You would simply not
believe how frustrating it is fo=
r someone whose job it is to explain

hatsoever what might be going

I hope this helps put a face on Sci=
ence, and that I have succintly

 no magic explanations

l better set

g
